name: 藝術治療與自我探索
goals: Understanding two major theories of art therapy
Experiencing the creativity of spontaneous art
Discussing the meanings of symbolic expression on the art works
syllabus:
1.    Introduction and preparation of the course

2.    Theory: Art as Therapy

Art work and class discussion: photographic self-portrait

Homework: introducing self and a short description of the photographic self-portrait

3.    Introduction: Art Psychotherapy

Art work and class discussion: free expression of self-portrait

Homework: description of the art work and trying to relate to symbolic meaning

4.    Symbol Formation

Art work and class discussion: memory and mirroring self-portrait

Homework: description of the memory representing on the art work

5.    Cultural Perspectives of Symbols

Art work and class discussion: collage self-portrait

Homework: make an imaginative story of the art work and writing feedback

6.    Nonverbal Communication and Symbols

Art work and class discussion: imaginative self-portrait

Homework: projective story and symbolic self

7.    Affect, Emotion, Feeling, and Symbols

Art work and class discussion: emotional self

Homework: description of the art work and considering daily emotions

8.    Conscious, Unconscious and Symbolic Expression

Art work and class discussion: unconscious self

Homework: description of the art work and insight into the unconscious

9.    Masculine and Feminine Symbols

Art work and class discussion: anima and animus self

Homework: description of the art work and feedback about learning

10. Mandalas

Art work and class discussion: focusing character in a mandala

Homework: description of the art work and feedback about learning

11. Persona and Symbols

Art work and class discussion: personal mask

Homework: description of the art work and considering the meaning of the mask

12. Shadow and Symbols

Art work and class discussion: shadow self

Homework: description of the art work and considering personal shadow

13. Complex and Symbols

Art work and class discussion: conflicting self

Homework: description of the art work and considering about personal conflict

14. True Self

Art work and class discussion: true self

Homework: description of the art work and considering the true self

15. The Self and Symbols

Art work and class discussion: making a portfolio cover

Homework: considering about true self and feedback of sharing portfolio

16. Final Assessment

Final report description: a power point file about personal art works and final feedback

Material: 12-color oil pastel, A4 drawing papers, information bags

methodologies.note: group discussion and learning by a theme every week
final project: a power point file for personal final report

grading.note: Description and feedback about art works done every week
final project: a power point file for personal final report
